title: OpenAI API Key Guide
description: Learn how to generate an OpenAI API Key for embeddings used in semantic search.

steps.title: Log in to OpenAI Platform
steps.description: Go to platform.openai.com and log in. If you don't have an account, sign up first.

steps.title: Navigate to API Keys
steps.description: Click on 'API keys' in the left sidebar.

steps.title: Create New Key
steps.description: Click the 'Create new secret key' button.

steps.title: Name Your Key
steps.description: Enter a descriptive name for the key (e.g., 'Docst-Embedding').

steps.title: Copy the Key
steps.warning: You won't be able to see this key again. Make sure to copy it to a secure location!
